lines.text: Be careful with that last verse.
Pinky, once again you've left the lens cap on your mind.

[Dot has been 'mortally wounded' by Salazar's canon. Yakko is holding her in his arms with Wakko crouching near them]
Dot... can you hear me?

[weakly opens eyes, takes Yakko's hand and nuzzles against it. She looks up at him, smiling weakly]
Tell me the story...

[weakly]
The story... about mom and dad... tell me

[cough]
Once upon a time, a brave knight married a beautiful princess... and they had two sons. But they wanted a daughter, to... so they planted a garden...

[softly]
And out of the prettiest flower came...

[Everyone is watching the scene with tears in their eyes]
So then mom and dad took you home
[is cradling Dot closer in his arms]
and everynight at bedtime, they'd come in and ask "Who the cutest girl?" and you'd say...
And they'd ask "How did you get so cute?" and you'd say...
And they'd say..."tell us your name?"... and you'd say...
Banana Fanna Bo Besca the Third" but you can call me

[voice breaking slightly]
and they'd ask..."Can we call you Dottie?"

[Very weakly]
No... just Dot... call me... Dottie...
[Yakko starts to cry and nuzzles against Dot's head]
I know! Pick me! Pick me! I know!

[looking at a ravine]
Wow, just don't look down.
Yeah. I've seen that movie three times and I still don't get it.

[after the Warners have thrown a sled named Rosebud on the open fire]
What do you want from us? We're freezing here!
But Brain, how ever will we get to the wishing star first?
Simple, Pinky. With the help of the great Leonardo DaVinci.
He is going to give us a ride there in his pant cuffs?
Oh, how sad. When's the funeral?
He died a long time ago.
And I forgot to send flowers? Stupid! Stupid! STUPID!
If we were supposed to fly we'd have come with little bags of nuts.
Pinky, you are a little bag of nuts!

[singing Jingle Bells]
Sailing through the slush/In a wind-blown wagon sled/Down the road we mush/Dot is still in bed!

[singing]
I'm getting really bored/I've read this magazine/If we don't get there soon/I think I'm gonna scream!

[sings the chorus]
Oh, wishing star, from afar/Dot is getting worse/Be a sport and grant our wish or we'll sing another verse!
We definitely gotta get you some singing lessons.
Hey, hey. Cheap shot. I'm old. Very old.
Please. Like you could sing when you were young?

[Mindy is up in a tree and Buttons climbs up to save her]
Silly Buttons. Puppies can't climb trees.

[Buttons falls to the ground]
Okay, I love you. Buh-bye!
I am your Desire Fulfillment Facilitator... but everybody calls me Pip.

[Bumps into a pretty squirrel girl]
Squirrel chicks, yowza!
He used to like nuts, now he's after dates.
Pinky, I knew I'd find you out here wasting time with this horse.
But Pharfigneuten and I have pledged out hearts to each other!
Pinky, that is a horse. You are a mouse.
Oh, Brain, don't be so intolerant. Why can't the horses and the mice live together in harmony? Along with the fairies and the wood sprites and the bean sprouts?
I stand corrected, Pinky. That is a horse, you are an imbisile.

[talking about King Salazar's wishes]
How about fame and fortune?
Here's Fame with Irene Cara and a subscription to Fortune Magazine!

[talking about wishes]
How about eternal youth? That I could be sixteen forever?
Yeah and you'd live that same year over and over and you'd have zits and no one would ever date you!
How about the Midas touch? Everything I touch will turn to gold.
Yeah, including food. Try eating a solid gold turkey. Adios bicuspids!
Mindy, darling! You're back! You're safe! Oh, thank goodness!

[Gasps]
Mindy! You called me "Mom"! You called me "Mom"! It's a miracle!

[singing]
Twinkle twinkle wishing star how I wonder where you are, out in space so bright and clear, can you see me way down here?

Let me pick the star that's right and pick the wishing star tonight, like finding a needle in a haystack, eeny meeny miney moe and jack, wishing star please hear my plea grant one wish one wish for me
uh oh I think I broke it!

[singing]
We're leaving Acme Falls to find the wishing star/ we're heading off to seek our dream come true/ It's waiting right out there/ the answer to our prayer.
That you might be a multimillionaire, that's why/ we're off to seek our destiny together...
Who cares about the stuff we lack/ we're on our way and we won't be back...
Gee, it looks kind of far.
Too bad we don't have a car.

Oh, what the hey! We're on our way/ to find the wishing star! We're leaving Acme Falls to find the wishing star/ and when we do, our troubles are gonna be through/ It's just around the bend/ it's where the mountains end/ We're packing our load/ we're hitting the road/ let's sing it together again - Hey hey! We want to be the first to touch the wishing star/ We're northward bound/ we're leaving town today!
The moment is now! We're Yakko, Wakko and Dot/ We're giving it all we've got!
We're coming, so ready or not...
Today's the day/ we're on our way to find the wishing star!
You horrible children! Who taught you how to behave?
You see - cough! Cough! We're orphans.

[Bambi eyes]
You know, we'd SO like to be adopted.
Will you be our new daddy?

[jumps on him]
Buy me a toy, daddy! Buy me a toy, buy me a toy, buy me a toy!
I know - I'll wish for a million bucks. No! Make that two million bucks!
[Salazar is suddenly trampled by a herd of male deer]
Just be glad it's not mating season.
[One of the deer makes a romantic face at Salazar]

[flying in the Air-Screw]
With the wind at our backs, all we have to do is maintain this velocity, and we'll be the first to reach the wishing star! Do you know what that means Pinky?
AAAAAHHHH! NO! Keep pedaling! Keep pedaling Pinky!
Huh, huh... You almost killed us! What were you thinking?
But you said stop! You really did Brain, you said 'stop.'

[starts pedaling again]
Sometimes you are so confused, Brain.
Oh, riiiight! The secrets about the wishing star- right! Yeah. You see, the key to the whole thing is... Uh, you got a little something in your nose.
Ewww! Get it! Get it! Get it!
Please! Could you go to the bathroom and take care of it? Oof. I mean, whoops!
[Goes into the bathroom. Wakko jumps down and locks the door]

[dancing]
We're in charge! We're in charge!
Hey, we'll find some other way to pay for her operation.
...Good question. See you in the morning.
